title: Highly Rated Charities
details: They're trusted for their measurable results, low administrative costs, and often receive top ratings from independent evaluators, earning public recognition for their effective social contributions.

title: It is toughest to be a child.
details: TODAY YOUR GIFT GETS MATCHED 5X TO HELP 5X MORE CHILDREN AT RISK

title: We are Rethink Mental Illness
details: Our goal is to make sure everyone severely affected by mental illness has a good quality of life.

title: Good that grows
details: Sponsoring a child provides them with the opportunity to see beyond their daily struggles
